hero.headline: Responsive web templates tailored to your clients
hero.description: Pre-built sections and components help you deliver a customized draft as soon as an order comes in. Speed up your projects with a consistent design system and reusable pieces.

highlights.title: Why teams rely on us
highlights.subtitle: We pre-build the sections and flows you need most often so you can adapt them quickly to every project.

responsive.title: Responsive grid system
responsive.description: Tailwind CSS utilities deliver pixel-perfect layouts on every screen size.

branding.title: Brand-friendly design
branding.description: Adjust colors, typography, and components to reflect each brand identity in minutes.

templates.title: Ready-to-ship pages
templates.description: Home, services, product, and portfolio pages prebuilt for rapid delivery.

workflow.title: 3-step delivery workflow
workflow.description: Most drafts ship within two days thanks to our streamlined, template-driven process.

steps.title: Select template & gather brand assets
steps.description: Match the client use case, then collect brand colors, logo, and tone of voice.

steps.title: Assemble sections & customize
steps.description: Compose hero, services, CTAs, and visuals to align with the brand narrative.

steps.title: QA & handoff
steps.description: Run responsive and accessibility checks, capture revisions, and prepare delivery.

testimonials.title: Feedback from partners
testimonials.subtitle: Studios and freelancers use these templates to accelerate delivery without sacrificing quality.

items.name: Kim Pro
items.quote: With pre-built templates we recreate the client's desired flow in half a day. Customizing details is effortless, and satisfaction is high.

items.name: Lee Designer
items.quote: The grid and components are so well organized that my turnaround time doubled. Mobile responsiveness works from the start.

items.name: Park Dev
items.quote: Vite + React keeps builds fast, and Tailwind ensures consistent styling, making maintenance easy.

service.title: Service overview template
service.description: Perfect for agencies and professional services. Put pricing, FAQs, and core value propositions in front of your clients instantly.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Ideal when you need to highlight a clear service process and build trustâ€”consulting, marketing, education, and more.

product.title: Product landing template
product.description: A flexible structure for SaaS, digital goods, and courses. Showcase features, benefits, and pricing clearly.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Best suited for SaaS startups, subscription services, and online education that need to explain product value quickly.

portfolio.title: Portfolio showcase template
portfolio.description: Designed for freelancers, studios, and creators. Present your best work, process, and client feedback in a cohesive story.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Great for design studios, personal portfolios, and media teams that need to emphasize visual references.

footer.description: Discover your love style through our MBTI-based love type test.

lovetype.title: LoveType
lovetype.subtitle: Discover your unique love type
lovetype.description: A love type test that analyzes your romantic style through 4 dimensions: leadership, affection expression, relationship views, and attitude.
lovetype.question: Question
lovetype.agreementQuestion: How much do you agree with A or B?
lovetype.exploreAllTypes: Explore all love types and find yours
lovetype.shareText: My love type is {{type}}! Check out your love type too ðŸ’•
lovetype.helpText: Please select the answer that best fits you. Be honest for accurate results.

features.mbtiDesc: Accurate analysis based on scientifically validated MBTI theory
features.loveDesc: More accurate results with love and relationship specialized questions
features.matchDesc: Provides compatibility with other types and love advice

questions.1: When looking for a new restaurant with my partner, who usually suggests it first?
questions.1.optionA: I tend to actively search and suggest it first
questions.1.optionB: I wait for my partner's suggestion or look for it together
questions.2: When a date plan suddenly falls through, what's your reaction?
questions.2.optionA: I quickly come up with a new alternative and take the lead
questions.2.optionB: I listen to my partner's opinion and follow what they want
questions.3: When planning a weekend trip with your partner, how do you usually prepare?
questions.3.optionA: I research destinations and accommodations in detail and suggest them
questions.3.optionB: I listen to my partner's opinions and prefer to prepare while discussing together
questions.4: After a fight with your partner, who usually initiates reconciliation?
questions.4.optionA: I tend to take the lead in conversation to improve the relationship
questions.4.optionB: I wait for my partner's reconciliation gesture or gently accept it
questions.5: When starting a new challenge or hobby together, what's your role?
questions.5.optionA: I take the lead in finding methods and guiding my partner
questions.5.optionB: I follow my partner's lead and enjoy it together
questions.6: When deciding on food menus, which side are you on?
questions.6.optionA: I clearly decide what I want to eat and suggest it
questions.6.optionB: I tend to go along with what my partner wants to eat
questions.7: When you receive an unexpected surprise event from your partner, what's your next action?
questions.7.optionA: I also plan and execute a surprise event for my partner
questions.7.optionB: I gratefully enjoy my partner's thoughtfulness and affection
questions.8: If asked to go shopping at a store you're not interested in?
questions.8.optionA: Honestly, I don't really want to go
questions.8.optionB: If it makes my partner happy, I'll go
questions.9: When your partner is struggling, how do you usually react?
questions.9.optionA: I actively comfort them and want to help solve the problem together
questions.9.optionB: I quietly support them from the side and try to understand their feelings
questions.10: When your partner says you're "cute," what's your honest feeling?
questions.10.optionA: When I hear that, I want to act even more spoiled and feel good
questions.10.optionB: I feel proud and satisfied that they've accepted me as I am
questions.11: When you encounter your partner's minor complaints or childish behavior, what's your reaction?
questions.11.optionA: I find it cute and lovely, so I want to accept it even more
questions.11.optionB: Seeing that makes me want to act spoiled myself
questions.12: What's your thought on physical intimacy with your partner?
questions.12.optionA: I think it's an important means to express and confirm affection
questions.12.optionB: It's a natural part of communication, and it's important that my partner feels comfortable
questions.13: When listening to your partner's worries, what's your usual attitude?
questions.13.optionA: I deeply empathize with their emotions and comfort them by sharing their sadness
questions.13.optionB: I tend to quietly listen to their story and stay by their side
questions.14: On anniversaries or special days, what kind of gift do you want from your partner?
questions.14.optionA: A customized gift that they prepared with care, knowing my tastes exactly
questions.14.optionB: Any gift with my partner's heart in it, I'll gladly accept it
questions.15: What's the image of a partner that suddenly comes to mind?
questions.16: What's the most effective way to reconcile after a fight with your partner?
questions.16.optionA: Sit down calmly, analyze the cause of the problem, and find a rational solution
questions.16.optionB: Honestly share each other's feelings and resolve it through heartfelt communication
questions.17: When celebrating an anniversary with your partner, what do you value more?
questions.17.optionA: Exchanging practical and necessary gifts and feeling realistic joy
questions.17.optionB: Creating touching events or special memories that leave a strong impression
questions.18: Do you have fantasies about proposals or weddings with your partner?
questions.18.optionA: I dream of a magnificent, romantic event that will be memorable
questions.18.optionB: I think simple and realistic is fine if the sincerity is there
questions.19: What's your financial management style during dating?
questions.19.optionA: I tend to spend and save money planfully for the future
questions.19.optionB: I tend to invest generously for current happiness and enjoyment
questions.20: When you feel that love has cooled, what's your coping method?
questions.20.optionA: I calmly accept the emotional change and seek ways to organize the relationship
questions.20.optionB: I try to reignite the passion or suffer emotionally to restore the relationship
questions.21.optionA: It's about pursuing stability and happiness through a realistic partnership
questions.21.optionB: It's the fruition of passionate love and life's most romantic promise
questions.22: After marriage, what's your ideal weekend with your partner?
questions.22.optionA: Spend time on self-development for the future or achieving common goals
questions.22.optionB: Reignite love through spontaneous dates or new experiences
questions.23: After starting to date your partner, how do you use your personal time?
questions.23.optionA: Even while dating, my appointments with friends or personal hobbies don't change much
questions.23.optionB: I prioritize my partner and focus most of my time on spending with them
questions.24: When your partner shows excessive jealousy or clinginess, what's your reaction?
questions.24.optionA: It's a bit burdensome, but I think 'they really like me' and let it go
questions.24.optionB: I feel it's a serious relationship problem and want to talk about it seriously
questions.25: How long after a breakup before you start a new relationship?
questions.25.optionA: The next relationship starts naturally when the right connection comes along
questions.25.optionB: After sufficiently grieving and organizing the relationship, I carefully prepare for the next one
questions.26: When you hear advice about dating from friends, what's your reaction?
questions.26.optionA: I take it as reference, but ultimately decide according to my own heart
questions.26.optionB: I seriously consider my friends' advice and carefully reflect on it
questions.27: Do you think you must share hobbies or interests with your partner?
questions.27.optionA: I respect each other's hobbies, and while time together is important, personal time is also necessary
questions.27.optionB: I want to share each other's hobbies or interests for a deeper relationship
questions.28: What's your view on natural interactions with the opposite sex during dating?
questions.28.optionA: As long as my partner doesn't get jealous, it's okay to socialize widely
questions.28.optionB: While dating, I try not to create opportunities for misunderstanding
questions.29: How much of your honest emotions do you express during dating?
questions.29.optionA: Sometimes I freely express my emotions without hiding them
questions.29.optionB: I consider my partner and control my emotions, expressing them carefully
questions.30: What does dating mean to you?
questions.30.optionA: It's an experience that makes life richer and more enjoyable
questions.30.optionB: It occupies an important part of life and should be nurtured carefully

LCRO.title: Cuddly Realistic Leader
LCRO.description: Leads at own pace but wants to act cute with partner. Seeks realistic and free relationships, occasionally wanting to be adorable in a stable relationship.
LCRO.advice: Maintain realistic judgment while not forgetting emotional connection with your partner.

LCRP.title: Cuddly Realistic Leader (Earnest)
LCRP.description: Leads at own pace but wants to act cute with partner. Realistic yet passionate, approaching relationships earnestly.
LCRP.advice: Pursue perfection but also learn to relax and enjoy.

LCPO.title: Cuddly Passionate Leader
LCPO.description: Leads at own pace but wants to act cute with partner. Seeks passionate and free relationships with emotional richness.
LCPO.advice: Be passionate but also respect your partner's pace and maintain balance.

LCPE.title: Cuddly Passionate Leader (Earnest)
LCPE.description: Leads at own pace but wants to act cute with partner. Passionate yet approaches relationships earnestly, seeking deep connections.
LCPE.advice: Earnestness is good, but sometimes enjoy things lightly.

LARO.title: Accepting Realistic Leader
LARO.description: Leads at own pace but wants to be accepted and protected by partner. Seeks realistic and free relationships.
LARO.advice: Leadership is good, but also be open to your partner's affection.

LARE.title: Accepting Realistic Leader (Earnest)
LARE.description: Leads at own pace but wants to be accepted and protected by partner. Approaches relationships realistically and earnestly.
LARE.advice: Earnestness is important, but sometimes flexibility in accepting your partner is needed.

LAPO.title: Accepting Passionate Leader
LAPO.description: Leads at own pace but wants to be accepted and protected by partner. Seeks passionate and free relationships.
LAPO.advice: Exercise passionate leadership while also accepting your partner's emotions.

LAPE.title: Accepting Passionate Leader (Earnest)
LAPE.description: Leads at own pace but wants to be accepted and protected by partner. Passionate yet approaches relationships earnestly.
LAPE.advice: Earnest passion is good, but be careful not to overwhelm your partner.

FCRO.title: Cuddly Realistic Follower
FCRO.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to act cute with them. Seeks realistic and free relationships, providing stable support.
FCRO.advice: Follow your partner but also actively express your own opinions.

FCRE.title: Cuddly Realistic Follower (Earnest)
FCRE.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to act cute with them. Approaches relationships realistically and earnestly.
FCRE.advice: Earnestness is good, but sometimes enjoy things leisurely.

FCPO.title: Cuddly Passionate Follower
FCPO.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to act cute with them. Seeks passionate and free relationships.
FCPO.advice: Passion is good, but also have the courage to express your own needs.

FCPE.title: Cuddly Passionate Follower (Earnest)
FCPE.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to act cute with them. Passionate yet approaches relationships earnestly.
FCPE.advice: Earnest passion is good, but also take care of your own happiness.

FARO.title: Accepting Realistic Follower
FARO.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to be accepted and protected by them. Seeks realistic and free relationships.
FARO.advice: Follow your partner while also expressing what you want.

FARE.title: Accepting Realistic Follower (Earnest)
FARE.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to be accepted and protected by them. Approaches relationships realistically and earnestly.
FARE.advice: Earnestness is important, but don't forget emotional connection.

FAPO.title: Accepting Passionate Follower
FAPO.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to be accepted and protected by them. Seeks passionate and free relationships.
FAPO.advice: Passion is good, but also have the courage to express your needs.

FAPE.title: Accepting Passionate Follower (Earnest)
FAPE.description: Matches partner's pace but wants to be accepted and protected by them. Passionate yet approaches relationships earnestly.
FAPE.advice: Earnest passion is good, but also value your own happiness.
